summary: Remember the glowing flowers in Forgotten Vale? Well they got a upgrade to 1k or 2k texture!
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][center][color=#c9daf8][u][b][img]https://imageshack.com/a/img923/7236/MjVREj.png[/img]
[color=#d5a6bd][size=4]EDIT: THANK YOU ALL FOR THE ENCOURAGEMENT AND FOR DOWNLOADING MY MOD.[/size][/color]

My project:[/b][/u][/color]
[size=3]I am going to re-texture all forgotten and ignored items within the dlcs and main game[size=5].[size=3]
Because the [/size][/size]﻿Gleamblossom are my favorite flower.
But while the rest of my game is either 1k or 4k the flowers looked sad and awful. 
This is my way to give back to the community. 
Comes in 1k or 2k Re-texure
[i]
And if you know any item that needs a upgrade to 4k texture, let me know.[/i]

[color=#f4f4f4][size=4][u][b]WILL BE DONE: [/b][/u][/size][/color]
-Poison Bloom
- Glowing Mushrooms
- Glowing stones
- 4K Option
- Parallax

[size=5][b][/b][size=5][size=3][size=5]Installation[/size][/size][/size]:[/size]
Click on download , I only know how NMM works so.
[/size]
[size=3][b][size=5]M[/size][/b][size=5]anual Installation[/size]
Drag / drop the "data" folder from the .7z archive to your Skyrim folder
(...Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim ) Please understand that i can not
give support for sorting out uninstallation problems if you installed
the mod manually and are unfamiliar with the folder structures and
files. If you are, then please use the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] instead.
__________________________________________________________

[color=#d5a6bd][size=5]FAQ:[/size][/color]
[color=#fff2cc][i][size=5][size=3][color=#fff2cc][i]My game crashed after installing this:[/i][/color]
[color=#ffffff][b]A: [/b][/color][/size][/size][/i][color=#ffffff][size=5][size=3][i]The texture might be to big for your pc, optimize the texture and try again or wait for my 1k version.[/i][/size][/size][/color][i]

I do not like how the gleamblossom / glowing ground flower looks:[/i][/color]
[b]A: [/b]Then install only the gleamblossom or the glowing ground flower. Or do not install it. It´s up to you.

[size=5][size=3][color=#fff2cc][i]I want to add this to Steam / Russian website , would that be ok?:[/i][/color]
[b]A: [/b]No[/size][/size]. I will do it myself if you show me the website.
[size=5][size=3]__________________________________________________________[/size][/size]
[color=#dd7e6b]
[/color][b][u][color=#b6d7a8][size=6]PERMISSIONS:[/size][/color]

[/u][/b][size=4]Feel free to use my textures ,no need to ask me for permission first. 
I only ask you two things: first, do not use them in paid mods or add to non-Nexus sites, and second, 
please give credit [size=3]to me. Because I worked hard on it.[/size][/size]

[size=5][b][u]THANK YOU TO THE SUPPORT GIVEN:[/u][/b][/size][size=3]
BRANDIIBUCK
SKYRIM EXTREME
SKYRIM UNLIMITED[/size]



[/size][size=3]
[/size][/center][/size]
author: MassiveMaster
